title: Bug 102516 - JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand
description: The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists the tables and columns in the data source. Currently, when the data set editor is opened, the entire schema is queried, resulting in a long wait time. Eventually, a message stating 'Only 500 items can be viewed in the available list...' is displayed. Bug 101372 requests the ability to filter based on schema.
OB: When the data set editor is opened, the entire schema is queried and a long wait time is experienced. Eventually, a message stating 'Only 500 items can be viewed in the available list...' is displayed.
EB: When the data set editor is opened, only a portion of the schema should be queried and displayed initially. The tables and columns should load on demand as the user navigates through the tree control.
SR:
1. Open the data set editor for a SQL Query.
2. Observe that the entire schema is queried and a long wait time is experienced.
3. Eventually, a message stating 'Only 500 items can be viewed in the available list...' is displayed.
4. Verify that the tables and columns load on demand as the user navigates through the tree control.
